ASV: 1 The book of the generation of Jesus Christ, the son of David, the son of Abraham.
CEB: 1 A record of the ancestors of Jesus Christ, son of David, son of Abraham: × References for Matthew 1:1
CSB: 1 The historical recorda of Jesus Christ, the Son of David, the Son of Abraham: × References for Matthew 1:1

ASV: 2 Abraham begat Isaac; and Isaac begat Jacob; and Jacob begat Judah and his brethren;
CEB: 2 Abraham was the father of Isaac. Isaac was the father of Jacob. Jacob was the father of Judah and his brothers.
CSB: 2 Abraham fatheredb Isaac, Isaac fathered Jacob, Jacob fathered Judah and his brothers, × References for Matthew 1:2

ASV: 3 and Judah begat Perez and Zerah of Tamar; and Perez begat Hezron; and Hezron begat Ram;
CEB: 3 Judah was the father of Perez and Zerah, whose mother was Tamar. Perez was the father of Hezron. Hezron was the father of Aram.
CSB: 3 Judah fathered Perez and Zerah by Tamar, Perez fathered Hezron, Hezron fathered Aram,

ASV: 4 and Ram begat Amminadab; and Amminadab begat Nahshon; and Nahshon begat Salmon;
CEB: 4 Aram was the father of Amminadab. Amminadab was the father of Nahshon. Nahshon was the father of Salmon.
CSB: 4 Aram fathered Aminadab, Aminadab fathered Nahshon, Nahshon fathered Salmon,

ASV: 5 and Salmon begat Boaz of Rahab; and Boaz begat Obed of Ruth; and Obed begat Jesse;
CEB: 5 Salmon was the father of Boaz, whose mother was Rahab. Boaz was the father of Obed, whose mother was Ruth. Obed was the father of Jesse.
CSB: 5 Salmon fathered Boaz by Rahab, Boaz fathered Obed by Ruth, Obed fathered Jesse,

ASV: 6 and Jesse begat David the king. And David begat Solomon of her [that had been the wife] of Uriah;
CEB: 6 Jesse was the father of David the king. David was the father of Solomon, whose mother had been the wife of Uriah.
CSB: 6 and Jesse fathered King David. Thenc David fathered Solomon by Uriah's wife, × References for Matthew 1:6

ASV: 7 and Solomon begat Rehoboam; and Rehoboam begat Abijah; and Abijah begat Asa;
CEB: 7 Solomon was the father of Rehoboam. Rehoboam was the father of Abijah. Abijah was the father of Asaph.
CSB: 7 Solomon fathered Rehoboam, Rehoboam fathered Abijah, Abijah fathered Asa,d × References for Matthew 1:7

ASV: 8 and Asa begat Jehoshaphat; and Jehoshaphat begat Joram; and Joram begat Uzziah;
CEB: 8 Asaph was the father of Jehoshaphat. Jehoshaphat was the father of Joram. Joram was the father of Uzziah.
CSB: 8 Asae fathered Jehoshaphat, Jehoshaphat fathered Joram, Joram fathered Uzziah, × References for Matthew 1:8

ASV: 9 and Uzziah begat Jotham; and Jotham begat Ahaz; and Ahaz begat Hezekiah;
CEB: 9 Uzziah was the father of Jotham. Jotham was the father of Ahaz. Ahaz was the father of Hezekiah.
CSB: 9 Uzziah fathered Jotham, Jotham fathered Ahaz, Ahaz fathered Hezekiah,

ASV: 10 and Hezekiah begat Manasseh; and Manasseh begat Amon; and Amon begat Josiah;
CEB: 10 Hezekiah was the father of Manasseh. Manasseh was the father of Amos. Amos was the father of Josiah.
CSB: 10 Hezekiah fathered Manasseh, Manasseh fathered Amon,f Among fathered Josiah, × References for Matthew 1:10

ASV: 11 and Josiah begat Jechoniah and his brethren, at the time of the carrying away to Babylon.
CEB: 11 Josiah was the father of Jechoniah and his brothers. This was at the time of the exile to Babylon.
CSB: 11 and Josiah fathered Jechoniah and his brothers at the time of the exile to Babylon.

ASV: 12 And after the carrying away to Babylon, Jechoniah begat Shealtiel; and Shealtiel begat Zerubbabel;
CEB: 12 After the exile to Babylon: Jechoniah was the father of Shealtiel. Shealtiel was the father of Zerubbabel.
CSB: 12 Then after the exile to Babylon Jechoniah fathered Salathiel, Salathiel fathered Zerubbabel, × References for Matthew 1:12

ASV: 13 and Zerubbabel begat Abiud; and Abiud begat Eliakim; and Eliakim begat Azor;
CEB: 13 Zerubbabel was the father of Abiud. Abiud was the father of Eliakim. Eliakim was the father of Azor.
CSB: 13 Zerubbabel fathered Abiud, Abiud fathered Eliakim, Eliakim fathered Azor,

ASV: 14 and Azor begat Sadoc; and Sadoc begat Achim; and Achim begat Eliud;
CEB: 14 Azor was the father of Zadok. Zadok was the father of Achim. Achim was the father of Eliud.
CSB: 14 Azor fathered Zadok, Zadok fathered Achim, Achim fathered Eliud,

ASV: 15 and Eliud begat Eleazar; and Eleazar begat Matthan; and Matthan begat Jacob;
CEB: 15 Eliud was the father of Eleazar. Eleazar was the father of Matthan. Matthan was the father of Jacob.
CSB: 15 Eliud fathered Eleazar, Eleazar fathered Matthan, Matthan fathered Jacob,
